bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) identical with luo li jie he 瘰癧結核 , nodular kernels of scrofula with pervasion-illness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 治小兒無故寒熱，強健如故，而身體頸項結核瘰 癧 , “To cure alternating and seemingly unfounded sensations of cold and heat among children, and return their strength to normal, as well as nodular kernels of scrofula with pervasion-illness affecting the body and the front and back of the neck”.

b) Of any other swelling between skin and flesh reminiscent of fruit kernels. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 35: 治癭氣結核，癗癗腫硬，宜服松蘿丸方 , “To cure nodu lar kernels of goiter qi, and pimples that are swollen and hard, the recipe to ingest pills with song luo is advisable”.

② Illness Sign of a swelling reminiscent of fruit kernels between skin and flesh. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 50: 其狀作結核，在皮肉間，三兩個相連累也 , “As its external appearance it develops nodular kernels in the region of skin and flesh, two or three in a line”.
